Uses of Interface
javax.microedition.lcdui.Choice

Packages that use Choice
javax.microedition.lcdui The UI API provides a set of features for implementation of user interfaces for MIDP applications. 
 

Uses of Choice in javax.microedition.lcdui
 

Classes in javax.microedition.lcdui that implement Choice
 class ChoiceGroup
          A ChoiceGroup is a group of selectable elements intended to be placed within a Form.
 class List
          A Screen containing list of choices.
